title: Is free rp possible?

replies.body: If you summit a support ticket Riot will give you only a little bit of rp but I think you can only do it once, I think the maxium they can give you is 100, every other site is a virus https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

RP requests are something we aren't equipped to handle here on Help & Support. You can make a request by [submitting a support ticket. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
